00043         struct sockaddr_in CreateSockAddr_In(char* addr, int port) {
00044 
00045                 struct sockaddr_in sockAddrStr;
00046                 memset(&sockAddrStr, 0, sizeof(struct sockaddr_in));
00047 
00048                 sockAddrStr.sin_family = AF_INET;
00049                 sockAddrStr.sin_port = htons(port);
00050                 if (addr == NULL)
00051                         sockAddrStr.sin_addr.s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
00052                 else
00053                         sockAddrStr.sin_addr.s_addr = inet_addr(addr);
00054 
00055                 return sockAddrStr;
00056         }
00057         ;

00092         void Close() {
00093                 if ((GetState() == FIN_WAIT) || (GetState() == ACTIVE)) {
00094                         MT_LOGTRACE("close socket")
00095                         close(sd);
00096                         SetState(CLOSED);
00097                 }
00098         }
